alert.note: Alert for Louisa; Scott (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 31 at 2:25PM CDT until March 31 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN ROCK ISLAND...CENTRAL MERCER...NORTHWESTERN HENRY... SOUTHEASTERN LOUISA AND SOUTH CENTRAL SCOTT COUNTIES... At 225 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Millersburg, or near Aledo, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Gingle Corners and Aledo Mercer County Airport around 230 PM CDT. Matherville, Hamlet, Marston and Old Gilchrist around 235 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Reynolds, Taylor Ridge, Preemption, Edgington, Loud Thunder Scout Camp, Andalusia, Coyne Center, Buffalo Shores, Milan, Buffalo, Oak Grove, Blackhawk State Park, Credit Island, Fruitland, Indian Bluff Golf Course, West Lake Park, Moline Quad-City Airport, Moline, Rock Island, Rock Island Arsenal, Rock Island County Fairgrounds, Silvis Heights, Davenport, East Moline, Silvis, Riverdale, Carbon Cliff and Bettendorf. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for northwestern and west central Illinois...and southeastern and east central Iowa.
